body_html:
This is an area that is contribution welcome. We cannot have GPU synchronize with CPU. There are a few ways:

  1. Trigger a "trap" instruction on GPU, which triggers an interrupt on the host CPU.
  2. Allocated a pinned memory on CPU, and write the error status from GPU in the kernel. During the launch, also schedule an asynchrous functor to check the status through "ThenExecute".
